products.title: Blue Denim Jacket
products.description: A stylish blue denim jacket with a relaxed fit, perfect for casual outings.

products.title: Classic White T-Shirt
products.description: Soft and comfortable classic white t-shirt, ideal for layering or wearing on its own.

products.description: High-quality black leather boots with durable soles, suitable for everyday wear.
